attributes.action: Army Opportunities for Teenagers Who Are Not in School
attributes.additional_details:
We believe the Army can:
	•	Offer hope and direction to teens who feel left behind
	•	Provide structure and purpose through mentorship and training
	•	Equip young people with valuable skills and qualifications
	•	Strengthen community ties and reduce youth crime or unemployment
attributes.background: Across the country, many teenagers face barriers to education due social reasons. These young people often lack access to structured mentorship, and career development.The Army, with its long history of discipline, training, and personal growth, can offer a powerful pathway for these individuals.

rejection.details:
You have to me in education or training until you are 18. You can already join the army at 16. 

You may wish to sign this petition which calls for national service to be introduced for your people: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/728868
